# CI/CD & Release Documentation

This folder contains implementation and operational documentation for CI/CD workflows and release processes.

## Documentation

- **[CI/CD Setup](CI_CD.md)** - GitHub Actions workflow and npm publishing setup
- **[Release Configuration](RELEASE_CONFIG.md)** - Semantic-release configuration guide
- **[Release Checklist](RELEASE_CHECKLIST.md)** - Pre-release verification checklist
- **[Troubleshooting](TROUBLESHOOTING.md)** - Common CI/CD issues and solutions

## Note

These are implementation/operational docs. For architecture and internal design documentation, see the main [docs/](../docs/) folder.
